t: AWS | Amazon Linux AMI
s: 1 week ago - The Amazon Linux AMI is a supported and maintained Linux image provided by Amazon Web Services for use on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2). It is designed to provide a stable, secure, and high performance execution environment for applications running on Amazon EC2.

t: Amazon Linux | endoflife.date
s: 3 days ago - Amazon Linux is a Linux server operating system from Amazon Web Services (AWS) available as an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) for use on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2).

t: Amazon Linux 2
s: 2 weeks ago - Amazon Linux 2 is a Linux operating system from AWS. It provides a security-focused, stable, and high-performance execution environment to develop and run cloud applications. Amazon Linux 2 is provided at no additional charge.

t: Linux based Operating System | Linux from AWS | Amazon Web Services
s: 1 day ago - Bottlerocket is a minimal Linux-based operating system purpose built to host container workloads. t: What is Amazon Linux 2? - Amazon Linux 2
s: Amazon Linux 2 (AL2) is a Linux operating system from Amazon Web Services (AWS). AL2 is designed to provide a stable, secure, and high-performing environment for applications running on Amazon EC2. It also includes packages that enable efficient integration with AWS, including launch configuration ...
